name: The 25 Number Game
description:
WARNING: You cannot play The 25 Number Game if your keyboard does not have a number keypad.

The 25 Number Game is a simple, yet surprisingly difficult, puzzle game to master. The object of the game is to fill a 5 by 5 grid with the numbers 1 through 25 in the least amount of time possible. There are only a few rules. The better you do the harder it gets. it has a game show atmosphere, and there are even cheats and easter eggs. Tired of the same old Windows puzzle games? Want something different and unique? Here it is. And besides it's freeware.
